description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $619.3K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 898845 Alberta. The average
  contract duration was 0.83 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.7M. The longest
  contract was 1.26 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.8M.
